column5: Hey Folks,  I'm heading out to Cambridge this weekend to meetup with some friends. While the wives are doing their thing, the men are going to be heading out and  possibly be doing some fishing - depending on water conditions.  Can anyone be kind enough to provide an update on the water conditions? Is there still a lot of ice? or has most of it melted? We'd like to do some shore fishing. I live in Brampton, so I wouldn't be able to drive out there just to find out the conditions myself; otherwise I would.  If anyone could provide an update, I would really appreciate it.  Thanks OFC'ers, A2F (Rob)
Drove past the other day, just a bunch of unsafe ice
Thanks Dan - is it fishable from shore? (not planning on doing any ice-fishing anyway)...
It wasn't, I'll drive by and have a look tomorrow.  Not really a good shore fishing lake
Hey Dan, anything? What's the news boss?
All ice, only open water in the middle
With this forcast it may refreeze before it starts to open up anymore. There calling for a cold spring...they have got it right so far.
